TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Match extends System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group

summary.span: 表示单个正则表达式匹配的结果。

span.span: Represents the results from a single regular expression match.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是不可变的, 并且没有公共构造函数。The object is immutable and has no public constructor. 类的实例由方法返回, 表示字符串中的第一个模式匹配项。An instance of the class is returned by the method and represents the first pattern match in a string. 后续匹配由方法返回的对象表示。Subsequent matches are represented by objects returned by the method. 此外, 方法将返回一个由零个、一个或多个对象组成的对象。In addition, a object that consists of zero, one, or more objects is returned by the method. 如果该方法无法与输入字符串中的正则表达式模式匹配, 则将返回一个空对象。If the method fails to match a regular expression pattern in an input string, it returns an empty object. 然后, 可以使用中`foreach` C#的构造或`For Each` Visual Basic 中的构造来循环访问集合。You can then use a `foreach` construct in C# or a `For Each` construct in Visual Basic to iterate the collection. 如果该方法无法与正则表达式模式匹配, 则将返回等于的对象。If the method fails to match the regular expression pattern, it returns a object that is equal to . 您可以使用属性来确定匹配是否成功。You can use the property to determine whether the match was successful. 下面的示例进行了这方面的演示。The following example provides an illustration. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class/cs/Match1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class/vb/Match1.vb#1)] 如果模式匹配成功, 则属性包含匹配的子字符串 , 属性指示输入字符串中匹配的子字符串的从零开始的起始位置, 属性指示输入字符串中匹配的子字符串的长度。If a pattern match is successful, the property contains the matched substring, the property indicates the zero-based starting position of the matched substring in the input string, and the property indicates the length of matched substring in the input string. 由于单个匹配可以涉及多个捕获组, 因此具有一个返回的属性。Because a single match can involve multiple capturing groups, has a property that returns the . 实例本身等效于集合`Match.Groups[0]`中的第一个对象 (`Match.Groups(0)`位于 Visual Basic), 该对象表示整个匹配项。 The instance itself is equivalent to the first object in the collection, at `Match.Groups[0]` (`Match.Groups(0)` in Visual Basic), which represents the entire match. 可以通过以下方式访问匹配中捕获的组:You can access the captured groups in a match in the following ways: - 您可以 C#使用 () 或`For Each` (Visual Basic) 构造来循环访问对象的成员。 `foreach`You can iterate the members of the object by using a `foreach` (C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic) construct. - 你可以使用属性按捕获组的数量检索组。You can use the property to retrieve groups by the number of the capturing group. 请注意, 可以通过调用实例方法来确定正则表达式中存在哪些编号组。Note that you can determine which numbered groups are present in a regular expression by calling the instance method. - 你可以使用属性按捕获组的名称检索组。You can use the property to retrieve groups by the name of the capturing group. 请注意, 可以通过调用实例方法来确定正则表达式中存在哪些命名组。Note that you can determine which named groups are present in a regular expression by calling the instance method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用正则表达式`Console\.Write(Line)?`。The following examples use the regular expression `Console\.Write(Line)?`. 正则表达式按如下方式解释：The regular expression is interpreted as follows: ||| |-|-| |控制台\\。写入Console\\.Write|匹配字符串“Console.Write”。Match the string "Console.Write". 请注意, "." 字符经过转义, 以便将其解释为文本句点, 而不是与任何字符匹配的通配符。Note that the "." character is escaped so that it is interpreted as a literal period rather than as a wildcard that matches any character.| |(行)？(Line)?|匹配字符串“Line”的零个或一个匹配项。Match zero or one occurrence of the string "Line".| **示例1****Example 1** 下面的示例调用方法以检索输入字符串中的所有模式匹配项。The following example calls the method to retrieve all pattern matches in an input string. 然后, 它将循环访问返回的对象中的对象以显示有关每个匹配项的信息。It then iterates the objects in the returned object to display information about each match. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class/cs/Match2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class/vb/Match2.vb#2)] **示例2****Example 2** 下面的示例调用和方法以一次检索一个匹配项。The following example calls the and methods to retrieve one match at a time. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class/cs/Match3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Class/vb/Match3.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Empty As Match
public: static property System::Text::RegularExpressions::Match ^ Empty { System::Text::RegularExpressions::Match ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets the empty group.

summary.span: 所有失败的匹配都返回此空匹配。

span.span: All failed matches return this empty match.
An empty match.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应使用此属性来确定匹配是否成功。This property should not be used to determine if a match is successful. 相反, 请使用`Match.Success`属性 (继承自)。Instead, use the `Match.Success` property (which is inherited from ).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Groups As GroupCollection

summary.span: 获取由正则表达式匹配的组的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of groups matched by the regular expression.
The character groups matched by the pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正则表达式模式可以包含子表达式, 子表达式是通过将正则表达式模式的一部分括在括号中来定义的。A regular expression pattern can include subexpressions, which are defined by enclosing a portion of the regular expression pattern in parentheses. 每个此类子表达式构成一个组。Every such subexpression forms a group. 属性提供对这些子表达式匹配项的信息的访问。The property provides access to information about those subexpression matches. 例如, 匹配北美电话号码的`(\d{3})-(\d{3}-\d{4})`正则表达式模式具有两个子表达式。For example, the regular expression pattern `(\d{3})-(\d{3}-\d{4})`, which matches North American telephone numbers, has two subexpressions. 第一个包含区号, 其中包含电话号码的前三位数字。The first consists of the area code, which composes the first three digits of the telephone number. 此组由正则表达式`(\d{3})`的第一部分捕获。第二个包含单个电话号码, 其中包含电话号码的最后7位数字。This group is captured by the first portion of the regular expression, `(\d{3})`.The second consists of the individual telephone number, which composes the last seven digits of the telephone number. 此组由正则表达式`(\d{3}-\d{4})`的第二部分捕获。This group is captured by the second portion of the regular expression, `(\d{3}-\d{4})`. 然后, 可以从 属性返回的对象中检索这两个组, 如下例所示。These two groups can then be retrieved from the object that is returned by the property, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.match.groups/cs/groups1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.match.groups/vb/groups1.vb#1)] 属性返回的对象是一个始终具有至少一个成员的从零开始的集合对象。The object returned by the property is a zero-based collection object that always has at least one member. 如果正则表达式引擎在特定输入字符串中找不到任何匹配项 , 则集合中单个对象 (索引0处的对象) 的属性将设置为`false` , 并且对象的属性设置为。If the regular expression engine cannot find any matches in a particular input string, the property of the single object in the collection (the object at index 0) is set to `false` and the object's property is set to . 如果正则表达式引擎可以找到匹配项, 则 属性返回的对象 (索引0处的元素) 中的第一个元素包含与整个正则表达式模式匹配的字符串。If the regular expression engine can find a match, the first element of the object (the element at index 0) returned by the property contains a string that matches the entire regular expression pattern. 如果正则表达式包含捕获组, 则每个后续元素 (从向上索引一个) 表示捕获的组。Each subsequent element, from index one upward, represents a captured group, if the regular expression includes capturing groups. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[分组构造](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md)一文中的 "分组构造和正则表达式对象" 一节。For more information, see the "Grouping Constructs and Regular Expression Objects" section of the [Grouping Constructs](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md) article. ## Examples 下面的示例尝试将正则表达式模式与示例字符串进行匹配。The following example attempts to match a regular expression pattern against a sample string. 该示例使用属性存储要显示到控制台的匹配项所检索的信息。The example uses the property to store information that is retrieved by the match for display to the console. [!code-cpp[Regex Match, NextMatch, Groups, Captures#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/regex match, nextmatch, groups, captures/cpp/snippet8.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[Regex Match, NextMatch, Groups, Captures#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/regex match, nextmatch, groups, captures/cs/snippet8.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Regex Match, NextMatch, Groups, Captures#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/regex match, nextmatch, groups, captures/vb/snippet8.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match NextMatch() cil managed

summary.span: 从上一个匹配结束的位置（即在上一个匹配字符之后的字符）开始返回一个包含下一个匹配结果的新 对象。

span.span: Returns a new object with the results for the next match, starting at the position at which the last match ended (at the character after the last matched character).

returns.span: 下一个正则表达式匹配。

span.span: The next regular expression match.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法类似于再次调用并传递 (`Index+Length`) 作为新的起始位置。This method is similar to calling again and passing (`Index+Length`) as the new starting position. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不会修改当前实例。This method does not modify the current instance. 相反, 它会返回一个新的对象, 其中包含有关下一个匹配项的信息。Instead, it returns a new object that contains information about the next match. 如果匹配操作的超时值有效, 但尝试查找下一个匹配项时, 尝试检索下一个匹配项可能会引发。Attempting to retrieve the next match may throw a if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect and the attempt to find the next match exceeds that time-out interval. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法在第一个匹配项之外捕获正则表达式匹配项。The following example uses the method to capture regular expression matches beyond the first match. [!code-cpp[Regex Match, NextMatch, Groups, Captures#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/regex match, nextmatch, groups, captures/cpp/snippet8.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[Regex Match, NextMatch, Groups, Captures#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/regex match, nextmatch, groups, captures/cs/snippet8.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Regex Match, NextMatch, Groups, Captures#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/regex match, nextmatch, groups, captures/vb/snippet8.vb#8)]

span.span: A time-out occurred.

para.span: 当通过调用方法重复匹配尝试时, 正则表达式引擎将提供空匹配特殊处理。

span.span: When a match attempt is repeated by calling the method, the regular expression engine gives empty matches special treatment.

para.span: 通常, 开始搜索下一个匹配项的精确位置。

span.span: Usually, begins the search for the next match exactly where the previous match left off.

para.span: 但是, 在空匹配项后, 该方法将在尝试下一个匹配项前向前移动一个字符。

span.span: However, after an empty match, the method advances by one character before trying the next match.

para.span: 此行为可确保正则表达式引擎将通过字符串进行。

span.span: This behavior guarantees that the regular expression engine will progress through the string.

para.span: 否则, 由于空匹配不会导致任何向前移动, 因此下一个匹配项将与上一个匹配项完全相同的位置开始, 并且它将重复匹配相同的空字符串。

span.span: Otherwise, because an empty match does not result in any forward movement, the next match would start in exactly the same place as the previous match, and it would match the same empty string repeatedly.

para.span: 下面的示例进行了这方面的演示。

span.span: The following example provides an illustration.

para.span: 正则表达式模式a \*在字符串 "abaabb" 中搜索字母 "a" 的零个或多个匹配项。

span.span: The regular expression pattern a\* searches for zero or more occurrences of the letter "a" in the string "abaabb".

para.span: 如示例中的输出所示, 搜索会找到六个匹配项。

span.span: As the output from the example shows, the search finds six matches.

para.span: 第一个匹配尝试查找第一个 "a"。

span.span: The first match attempt finds the first "a".

para.span: 第二个匹配从第一个匹配结束的位置开始, 在第一个 b 之前开始;它查找 "a" 的零次, 并返回一个空字符串。

span.span: The second match starts exactly where the first match ends, before the first b; it finds zero occurrences of "a" and returns an empty string.

para.span: 第三个匹配项并不完全从第二个匹配项结束的位置开始, 因为第二个匹配项返回空字符串。

span.span: The third match does not begin exactly where the second match ended, because the second match returned an empty string.

para.span: 相反, 它会在后面的第一个 "b" 后开始一个字符。

span.span: Instead, it begins one character later, after the first "b".

para.span: 第三个匹配项查找 "a" 的两个匹配项, 并返回 "aa"。

span.span: The third match finds two occurrences of "a" and returns "aa".

para.span: 第四个匹配尝试从第三个匹配项的第二个匹配项的第二个 "b" 之前开始, 并返回一个空字符串。

span.span: The fourth match attempt begins where the third match ended, before the second "b", and returns an empty string.

para.span: 第五次匹配尝试再次推进一个字符, 以使其在第三个 "b" 之前开始, 并返回一个空字符串。

span.span: The fifth match attempt again advances one character so that it begins before the third "b" and returns an empty string.

para.span: 第六个匹配项的开头为 "b", 并再次返回空字符串。

span.span: The sixth match begins after the last "b" and returns an empty string again.

[!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.NextMatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.match.nextmatch/cs/nextmatch1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.NextMatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.match.nextmatch/vb/nextmatch1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string Result(string replacement) cil managed
Public Overridable Function Result (replacement As String) As String
abstract member Result : string -> string override this.Result : string -> string

span.span: The replacement pattern to use.

summary.span: 返回对指定替换模式的扩展。

span.span: Returns the expansion of the specified replacement pattern.
The expanded version of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将输入字符串中的所有匹配项替换为指定的替换模式 , 而方法会将单个匹配项替换为指定的替换模式。 Whereas the method replaces all matches in an input string with a specified replacement pattern, the method replaces a single match with a specified replacement pattern. 因为它对单个匹配项进行操作, 所以在调用方法之前, 还可以对匹配的字符串执行处理。Because it operates on an individual match, it is also possible to perform processing on the matched string before you call the method. `replacement`参数是标准正则表达式替换模式。The `replacement` parameter is a standard regular expression replacement pattern. 它可以包含文本字符和正则表达式替换。It can consist of literal characters and regular expression substitutions. 有关更多信息，请参见 [替代](~/docs/standard/base-types/substitutions-in-regular-expressions.md)。For more information, see [Substitutions](~/docs/standard/base-types/substitutions-in-regular-expressions.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用括号替换开头和结尾带括号的连字符。The following example replaces the hyphens that begin and end a parenthetical expression with parentheses. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Result#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.match.result/cs/result1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match.Result#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.match.result/vb/result1.vb#1)] 正则表达式模式 `--(.+?)--` 的含义如下表所示。The regular expression pattern `--(.+?)--` is interpreted as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`--`|匹配两个连字符。Match two hyphens.| |`(.+?)`|匹配任一字符一次或多次, 但次数尽可能少。Match any character one or more times, but as few times as possible. 这是第一个捕获组。This is the first capturing group.| |`--`|匹配两个连字符。Match two hyphens.| 请注意, 正则表达式`--(.+?)--`模式使用惰性限定符`+?`。Note that the regular expression pattern `--(.+?)--` uses the lazy quantifier `+?`. 如果改为使用`+`贪婪限定符, 则正则表达式引擎在输入字符串中仅查找单个匹配项。If the greedy quantifier `+` were used instead, the regular expression engine would find only a single match in the input string. 替换字符串`($1)`用括在括号中的第一个捕获组替换匹配项。The replacement string `($1)` replaces the match with the first captured group, which is enclosed in parentheses.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 不允许对此模式进行扩展。

span.span: Expansion is not allowed for this pattern.
Substitutions

span.span: A regular expression match equivalent to the one expected.

summary.span: 返回一个与提供的实例等效的 实例，该实例适合在多个线程间共享。

span.span: Returns a instance equivalent to the one supplied that is suitable to share between multiple threads.

returns.span: 适合在多个线程间共享的正则表达式匹配。

span.span: A regular expression match that is suitable to share between multiple threads.
is .
